keyMappings:
unmapAll

" Scroll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
" map <C-f> scrollFullPageDown
" map <C-b> scrollFullPageUp

map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom

" Link Hints
map f LinkHints.activateMode

" Mode
map v enterVisualMode
" map vc enterCaretMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

" Reload
" map <C-r> reload
unmap r

" Search
map <Space>fs createTab chrome://settings/
map <Space>fo Vomnibar.activate
map <Space>fO Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <Space>fm Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map <Space>fM Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map <Space>fb Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

" Find
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

" HIstory
map <C-o> goBack
map <C-i> goForward

" Tab
map <Space>ww createTab
map <Space>wj createTab
map <Space>wl createTab
map wj nextTab
map wk previousTab
map wl nextTab
map wh previousTab
map wc removeTab
map wu restoreTab

" Help
map <Space>hh showHelp
